item.title: Taylor Sheridan’s ‘Landman’ Announces Season 2 Premiere Date

item.title: Why Do the Emmys Hate Taylor Sheridan Shows?
item.description: From ‘Landman’ to ‘1923’ to ‘Yellowstone’ to ‘Tulsa King,’ once again the prolific writer-producer-director’s dramas were almost entirely snubbed.
